The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[18 January]] [[1948]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Rosemary'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 328</ref>

*'''Subject''':  Tolkien replies to a letter of appreciation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' from Rosemary. 
*'''Publication:''' Mentioned in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Chronology'' (p. 328) and a facsimile was published in [[Mallorn 36]]
*'''Description:''' Two pages, handwritten, signed.<ref>[[Mallorn 36]] (1998)</ref>
==See also==
*[[Letter to Rosemary (30 September 1947)]]
